mapper.select: SELECT a.accom_number, a.accom_name, a.accom_address, a.tele_number, a.accom_category, a.accom_details, a.check_in, a.check_out, a.business_number, a.id, a.img, MIN(ro.room_price) AS min_price, IFNULL(r.review_count, 0) AS review_count, IFNULL(r.avg_rating, 0.0) AS avg_rating, CASE WHEN f.accom_number IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE null END AS is_favorite FROM accommodation a JOIN rooms ro ON a.accom_number = ro.accom_number LEFT JOIN favorite f ON a.accom_number = f.accom_number LEFT JOIN ( SELECT accom_number, COUNT(*) AS review_count, FORMAT(AVG(review_rating), 1) AS avg_rating FROM review GROUP BY accom_number ) r ON a.accom_number = r.accom_number WHERE (a.deletion_request = 0 OR a.deletion_request = 1) AND a.add_request = 0 GROUP BY a.accom_number ORDER BY a.accom_number DESC
